Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/50th Ave
ShortDescription: #12 Roosevelt buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Kostner, Harrison, Laramie and Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/50th Ave

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Kostner, Harrison, Laramie and Roosevelt, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/50th Ave.

Allow extra travel time.
